website_summaries.verdict: Despite the boom of technologies in sneakers today classic sneakers that are minimal and simple have been proven to stand the test of time and style. The Reebok Revenge Plus TRC's timeless design with a retro vibe offers precisely this. Its clean and streamlined silhouette transcends trends and easily matches with plenty of ensembles as well.The shoe's comfort and enduring style go hand in hand with how the kick manages to stay relevant through the years.
pros: The Reebok Revenge Plus TRC is available in neutral colorways that are easy to pair with a myriad of outfits
Its retro design is adored by most consumers and deemed it as stylish and timeless
Comfortable was a word frequently used in describing this pair
Most consumers said that it ran true to size
The shoe can be customized through the brand's official site
Customers who were wide-footed were pleasantly surprised with the kick's sufficient width
Several purchasers mentioned that the shoe's materials and construction are of excellent quality
cons: One reviewer said that the shoe looked too bulky and wide for his taste

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Perfect fit. The leather quality in these feels more like the throwback Reebok classics. Love it. Recently, it seems with most I've bought, the leather quality has been thin. Reebok, I always buy a half size up than Nike or some other sneakers. So, if you're not sure, buy a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have bad feet and have a problem with shoes, these shoes are one of the best I have worn in a long time. Comfort and support. The price on the shoe is well wroth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: I got these at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: I paid just a few pennies over $20 for these sneakers, so how can I complain? But now that I've got them, I find that they are slightly uncomfortable because the heels are too low. That should have been obvious, just from looking at a picture. Anyway, I have ordered some glue-on heels to give the heels a little bit of boost. Other than this minor problem, these sneakers seem to be comfortable and high quality, as I would expect from Reebok.
customer_reviews.author: Judson T. Pewther

customer_reviews.title: Slightly narrow, but great looks and construction
customer_reviews.text: These fit in my normal size but they seem a little narrow at the toe area. Otherwise, I like everything about them. The materials feel like quality stuff, and I have gotten compliments on how they look. I might go up a half-size if i get more.
customer_reviews.author: J McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Just cool shoes, too cool!
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday shoe! Comfortable, easy on the eyes and REEKS cool. I’m not a cool guy, I’m just not, but when I put these on my cool factor doubles. Well how much is double you ask? Great question....next. Like I said, these are my everyday go to. Do I feel like a rock star in them, nah, but I look like one 😎 and you can too!
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sneakers, but too tight
customer_reviews.text: Prompt shipping. They look like real leather but are manmade. Nonetheless, they are well made and seem to be durable. However, they are too tight and I don't expect them to adjust, as they are not leather. Gave them to my son, and ordered another model, very similar to this one, but half a size larger. Hope they will fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolae

customer_reviews.title: Looked cool; very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box, I thought they looked pretty cool. But then I put them on. Leather was stiff and the shoes were uncomfortable. Also felt a little small in the toe box. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: femme512q

customer_reviews.title: Mega Sweet on me Feet
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Here in northern Vermont it's boots,New Balance or Nike. I'm from south east Massachusetts. There's a Reebok factory outlet in my home town. But from many years experience Reebok and Adidas are the best longest lasting footwear you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Deathcrushor

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: Is not that comfortable and size is incorrect. Smaller and too tight of a fit. Threw away after a month. Too painful to wear
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality shoes at a great price, I paid about $24 and these were completely worth every dollar. People forget that Reebok makes quality shoes at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel S.

customer_reviews.title: Reebok need to make a Wide sneaker available.
customer_reviews.text: I returned it to Amazon because 9N will not fit. I need a 9W.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE TEABO

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the shoe. Didn't expect low quality. Thin front top. I expected the flat no arch support. I could remedy that. They just felt cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Virg

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for a men’s shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman with kind of wide feet, but not super wide feet. Men’s shoes usually fit quite well and these are no exception. They are comfortable and seem well made. I got the lavender suede and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit awesome and look cool. I constantly get comments about how sick these look. Way cheaper than ording from Reebok directly, 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Russell C Coker

customer_reviews.title: Look Great and Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great color and very stylish! They run small. My Reebok Classic Phase 1 Pros are size 9. Returned Revenge Plus size 9 men’s order for 9.5. So you may want to order 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: sanfrantom

customer_reviews.title: Super comfort , and amazing classic style .
customer_reviews.text: I can't ask for more on this super stylish good looking shoes very happy with this purchase , highly recomended if you looking for a 80' style .
customer_reviews.author: jan vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and still old school but def new school kool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for old skool but def still new skool kool
customer_reviews.author: MNJ

customer_reviews.title: Run narrow
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and color, but stiff shoes and run narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Prilemar

customer_reviews.title: Skate Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, true to size. Very nice width wise, not too slim, but not super wide. They are comfy and look great. I’ve been skateboarding wearing these shoes and getting many many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift for my husband. They fit perfectly. Very comfortable shoe. They are my husband go to shoe now.
customer_reviews.author: Finalove15

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe look great feel great bought for my husband
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: These Reebok’s are great, very comfortable and stylish. I’ve purchased two different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reebok is a great product
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit great look good and very comfortable to walk in love them
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed, the materials of excellent quality, the sole is sewn not stuck and that makes them more durable very good shoes in relation quality price
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Pazmiño

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price range
customer_reviews.text: Awesome haven't seen these in a while. Great shoes for 30$ n less. No fake rubber. Good stitching
customer_reviews.author: James BigE

customer_reviews.title: stylish for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: clean, cream white shoes are in and there are good
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Crazy comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great style and comfortable from the moment I put them on. I get a lot of compliments on them. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: quiroz

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy  it , it looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy it , it looks very nice , i like to shop on Amazon , and i feel on the safe side with my money
customer_reviews.author: Jean Luthger.ETIENNE

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Loose fitting. Looked more worn out than my 3-year old adidas in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Revenge Plus Cross Trainer
